text: @PressSec Herman Cain is dead b/c he attended a Trump Rally in Tulsa & didn’t wear a mask. Trump’s vanity killed his friend as surely as if he pulled out a gun on 5th Ave & shot him in cold blood. The #TrumpVirus killed him.  #TrumpDeathToll150K #DeathCult #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/6NVRa9T5pP
